article_title: In TV interview, Madison Police Chief Mike Koval discusses strained relationships, apology after Tony Robinson shooting
article_text: Share your opinion on this topic by sending a letter to the editor to tctvoice@madison.com. Include your full name, hometown and phone number. Your name and town will be published. The phone number is for verification purposes only. Please keep your letter to 250 words or less.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , tony robinson, mike koval, madison police department
article_metadata.author: Todd D. Milewski | The Capital Times

og.description: The shooting of Tony Robinson has strained relationships between Madison Police and the community, Koval said, but he doesn't see it as a defining instance for his department.
